pageProps.title: Getting Started with Server-Side Rendering in React: Basics and Configuration
pageProps.metaDesc: Server-side rendering (SSR) is a technique that involves rendering a web page on the server before sending it to the client's browser. It is often used to improve the performance of web applications by reducing the time it takes for the page to load. In this article, we will explore the basics of server-side rendering in React and how to configure it.
